tissueExpression.summary: A subset of cells in lymphoid tissues and bone marrow showed strong positivity while a small number of glial cells displayed moderate cytoplasmic staining. Normal tissues in general were negative.

subcellularLocation.summary: Mainly localized to the nucleus but excluded from the nucleoli in both human and mouse cells.

tissueExpression.summary: A subset of cells in lymphoid tissues and bone marrow showed strong positivity while a small number of glial cells displayed moderate cytoplasmic staining. Normal tissues in general were negative.
A fraction of renal cancers, malignan gliomas and melanomas showed distinct cytoplasmic immunoreactivity. Malignant cells in general were negative.
